name: Mark of the Ninja
description: In Mark of the Ninja, you'll know what it is to truly be a ninja. You must be silent, agile and clever to outwit your opponents in a world of gorgeous scenery and flowing animation. Marked with cursed tattoos giving you heightened senses, every situation presents you with options. Will you be an unknown, invisible ghost, or a brutal, silent assassin?

files.goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Linux installer

content:
files:
- goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Linux installer
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/start.sh
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/GOG
    file: goginstaller
    format: zip
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/GOG/data/noarch/
